_metadata.purpose: Golden test data for TASK-103 SRT period timestamp verification
notes: Tests Otter.ai style SRT with period timestamps (00:00:00.000)
Speaker extraction from '[Speaker]' bracket prefix pattern
Multi-line cue payloads joined with single space

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Welcome to the design review session.
segments.raw_text: [Alice] Welcome to the design review session.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Thanks Alice. I have the diagrams ready.
segments.raw_text: [Bob] Thanks Alice. I have the diagrams ready.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: Great. Let's walk through the architecture.
segments.raw_text: [Alice] Great. Let's walk through the architecture.

segments.speaker: Charlie
segments.text: I have some questions about the data flow.
segments.raw_text: [Charlie] I have some questions about the data flow.

segments.speaker: Bob
segments.text: Sure, let me explain. The data flows from the ingestion layer to the processing pipeline.
segments.raw_text:
[Bob] Sure, let me explain. The data flows from
the ingestion layer to the processing pipeline.

segments.speaker: Alice
segments.text: And the storage layer handles persistence. We use event sourcing for audit trails.
segments.raw_text:
[Alice] And the storage layer handles persistence.
We use event sourcing for audit trails.
